title: Finding Lubchenko
description: Having secretly sold his father's office equipment on the Internet for quick cash, Evan finds himself in a bad situation when his father is accused of a murder due to one of the sales, thus causing Evan to track down the real culprit via cryptic e-mails in order to clear his father's name while keeping his own thievery a secret to all. Reprint.
author: Michael   Simmons
